products.name: Grass Starter
products.description: Place this on your farm to start a new patch of grass.

products.name: Parsnip Seeds
products.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 4 days to mature.

products.name: Sugar
products.description: Adds sweetness to pastries and candies. Too much can be unhealthy.

products.name: Bean Starter
products.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 10 days to mature, but keeps producing after that. Grows on a trellis.

products.name: Cauliflower Seeds
products.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to produce a large cauliflower.

products.name: Eggplant Seeds
products.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 5 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

products.name: Wheat Flour
products.description: A common cooking ingredient made from crushed wheat seeds.

products.name: Rice
products.description: A basic grain often served under vegetables.

products.name: Oil
products.description: All purpose cooking oil.

products.name: Vinegar
products.description: An aged fermented liquid used in many cooking recipes.

products.name: Basic Fertilizer
products.description: Improves soil quality a little, increasing your chance to grow quality crops. Mix into tilled soil.

products.name: Quality Fertilizer
products.description: Improves soil quality, increasing your chance to grow quality crops. Mix into tilled soil.

products.name: Basic Retaining Soil
products.description: This soil has a chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

products.name: Quality Retaining Soil
products.description: This soil has a good chance of staying watered overnight. Mix into tilled soil.

products.name: Speed-Gro
products.description: Stimulates leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 10%. Mix into tilled soil.

products.name: Pumpkin Seeds
products.description: Plant these in the fall. Takes 13 days to mature.

products.name: Melon Seeds
products.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 12 days to mature.

products.name: Deluxe Speed-Gro
products.description: Stimulates leaf production. Guaranteed to increase growth rate by at least 25%. Mix into tilled soil.

products.name: Tomato Seeds
products.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 11 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

products.name: Cherry Sapling
products.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Cherry tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

products.name: Apricot Sapling
products.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apricot tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

products.name: Orange Sapling
products.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Orange tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

products.name: Peach Sapling
products.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Peach tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

products.name: Pomegranate Sapling
products.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Pomegranate tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

products.name: Apple Sapling
products.description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apple tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

products.name: Catalogue
products.description: Provides unlimited access to all wallpapers and floors... from the convenience of your home!

products.name: Blueberry Seeds
products.description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 13 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

products.name: Potato Seeds
products.description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 6 days to mature, and has a chance of yielding multiple potatoes at harvest.

products.name: Bouquet
products.description: A gift that shows your romantic interest.
